p:
Required information, such as age groups of moving animals, dates of exits and entries, source and destination herds, were taken directly from the FNCD. The missing information only concerned the health state of moving animals

, which was drawn using Multinomial distributions and probabilities

computed on simulated epidemic dynamics in the relevant age groups in source herds. If the animals at move came from outside the metapopulation,

S , M , T , P , R
, g
was assumed equal to the simulated distributions among health states of all animals present in the metapopulation. This implicitly means that the metapopulation is a representative subset of a larger cattle population.
